item.description:
(PLEASE only rsvp if you are a yes!!!  If you are a no then please do not RSVP at all.  Thanks)

Pot luck- Sunday May 19 - 3:30pm-  following the 1:00pm Lincoln bike ride/walk with Prov. Bike meet-up -  on Sunday - at a private house in Cumberland, RI.  (address will be sent to yes rsvp’s)

Please please please post in your rsvp what food you will bring to share.  And BYOBeverage.

People doing the bike ride or walk can keep food in a cooler in your car -  - or drop food at the house before the ride. Or stop at Daves Market on the way (after the ride)

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Pot Luck
